modules.description: Provides functions to increment, decrement, and retrieve values from counter structures. Works with hash tables that map string keys to integer counts. Used to track and update statistics during parsing or transformation processes.

Generates code for tracking statistics from record types by creating accessors, counters, and export functions. It processes OCaml type declarations, label declarations, and expressions to inject instrumentation logic. Specific use cases include dynamically generating code for monitoring field values and aggregating counter data during runtime.
